snippet: Traditional retailers like Nordstrom are tapping into the expertise of e-commerce companies such as Bonobos, which in turn are learning the advantages of bricks and mortar.
abstract: Traditional retailers like Nordstrom are tapping into the expertise of e-commerce companies such as Bonobos, which in turn are learning the advantages of bricks and mortar.

headline.main: Stores Go Online to Find a Perfect Fit
headline.print_headline: Stores Go Online to Find a Perfect Fit
